title: Heavier or Lighter?
solution:
Weigh 1

Weigh 1 2 3 4 and 5 6 7 8

If even go to Weigh 2a, if left is lighter go to Weight 2b, if right is lighter go to Weigh 2c

Weigh 1 2 3 and 9 10 11

If even 12 is lightest, if left is lighter go to Weigh 3a, if right is lighter go to Weigh 3b

Weigh 1 2 9 and 3 4 5

If even go to Weigh 3c, if left is lighter go to Weigh 3d, if right is lighter go to Weigh 3e

Weigh 9 and 10

Lightest is answer, If even 11 is lightest
